title: Kampuchea: the long road back

description: Commissioned by the sponsors of the Kampuchean Relief Appeal this made for television documentary shows how donations to International Relief Aid were used to bring aid to Kampuchea. Also records the plight of Kampucheans still struggling for survival after the death and destruction caused by the Pol Pot regime. Narrated by Leonard Teale.
